name: Claire's Grabby Grab store
description:
My very first Unity game, made for my daughter, Claire. 

All assets are made in Blender by my self. 

Audio file are from https://freesound.org. 

Skybox is from https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/fantasy-skybox-free-18353. 

Wish you enjoy it!
